What we do

Private Market

PE Investment

Hanwha's PE Investment Group is Hanwha Asset Management's private equity arm, targeting direct investments in high-performing companies with durable growth, resilient business models, and expanding global competitiveness

Credit Investment

Focusing on Thematic Investments and Continuous Event-Driven Lending Opportunities in Asia-Pacific Private Credit Market Special Focus on High-Growth Sectors such as Asia High-Tech and Next-Generation Infrastructure Private IG Aims to Deliver Tailored Private Debt Solutions for Asian Companies (Conglomerates), Particularly in Korea

Real Estate Platform Investment

Hanwha's Real Estate Platform Investment Group is specialized in investing in “New Economy” real estate through partnering with operators to enerate income enhancement and capital appreciation

Infrastructure Platform Investment

Infrastructure Platform Investment Group specializes in investments across infrastructure, the AI ecosystem, and sustainability-focused sectors With deep expertise and market insights, we continue to build a strong track record and deal pipeline across diverse investment opportunities

FoFs Investment

Manage institutional capital deployed globally across PE,private credit, real estate and infrastructure asset classes

  • Bridge Domestic Investors to the Global Private Capital Market
  • Asia Fund Program : Expand to Global Investor Base with Deep Investment Experience

VC Investment

Capture selectively sourced global opportunities byinvesting in high-growth companies and leading fund managers to drive superior returns

  • Direct Investment : By leveraging our strong networks and analytical capabilities, selectively access well-validated, high-potential opportunities
  • Fund of Funds Investment : Strategic access to leading global venture funds through top-tier GP networks
